thread.title_full: Exclusive Criminal Minds Sneak Peek: Someone's Drinking on the Job

author: TV Guide
title: Exclusive Criminal Minds Sneak Peek: Someone's Drinking on the Job
text: Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 2:43 PM Updated Oct 20, 2015 at 3:11   20, 2015 at 2:43 PM Updated Oct 20, 2015 at 3:11 PM It's 5 o'clock somewhere, but not when you're trying to catch an unsub. On Wednesday's Criminal Minds , the team heads to the notorious outlaw town of Las Vegas, N.M., after three restaurant employees are killed in similar fashion to a six-year-old cold case. As you can see in the exclusive first look above, some people are not handling the investigation well. Criminal Minds airs Wednesdays at 9/8c on CBS. (Full disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS.)
